title: Roots Market
description: Natural food market specializing in all natural and organic food products. All organic fresh fruit and vegetable. Bulk staples, packaged foods, beer and wine, body care products, fresh baked breads, herbs & supplements, and more. Has another location in Olney and operates other socially-responsible businesses within the same shopping center: Nest (clothing and gift boutique), Great Sage (organic, vegetarian restaurant) and Bark (natural pet food and supplies).
